titleStmt.title: Phylaster, or, Loue lyes a bleeding acted at the Globe by His Maiesties seruants / written by [brace] Francis Baymont and Iohn Fletcher ...
titleStmt.author: Beaumont, Francis, 1584-1616.
Fletcher, John, 1579-1625.

publicationStmt.publisher: For Thomas Walkley, and are to be sold at his shop at the Eagle and Child in Brittaines Bursse,

notesStmt.note: Errors in paging: p. 12, 44 and 46 misnumbered 14, 42 and 64 respectively.
Identified as STC 1681 at reel position 1194:15.
Reproduction of originals in the Henry E. Huntington Library and Art Gallery.
